Posts.Content: missray wrote: I had a stereotactic biopsy with 2 sites being checked but they couldn't get to the 2nd site because of a hematoma.  Now the surgeon wants me to wait 3 months for 2nd biopsy and I am l very anxious.  My first site came back ok.  Anyone ever had to wait for a hematoma to heal.  I just need to put this thing to rest one way or another.  Thanks!
